projects.name: Bitcoin Hyper
projects.desc: Bitcoin Hyper is a new Bitcoin fork for 2025, combining staking rewards, fast transaction finality, and Solana-level speeds while maintaining Bitcoin’s security ethos. It uses a hybrid consensus model (Proof of Stake and Nakamoto-style checkpoints) and is designed for both scalability and decentralization. Early demand and a credible development team suggest strong potential, but it remains under the radar.

projects.name: Vault AI
projects.desc: Vault AI merges artificial intelligence with DeFi tools on its own blockchain, aiming to automate and optimize decentralized finance operations using advanced AI models. The project is in presale and targets early adopters interested in AI-blockchain integration.

projects.name: Qubetics
projects.desc: Qubetics focuses on tokenizing real estate and intellectual property, allowing fractional ownership and liquidity for traditionally illiquid assets. It has raised $14.5M in its presale and leverages blockchain for secure asset management.

projects.name: Web3Bay
projects.desc: Web3Bay is an e-commerce platform that offers users a 5% discount when shopping with its native 3BAY token, aiming to reimagine online retail with blockchain-based loyalty and payment systems.

projects.name: Cogni AI
projects.desc: Cogni AI allocates 50% of its tokens to presale and focuses on natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) applications, integrating AI with blockchain for decentralized data analysis and automation.

projects.name: Lightchain AI
projects.desc: Lightchain AI introduces a 'Proof of Intelligence' consensus mechanism, reserving 40% of tokens for early investors. It aims to leverage AI for network security and efficiency, blending machine learning with blockchain consensus.

projects.name: Solaxy
projects.desc: Solaxy is a Layer-2 scaling solution for Solana, designed to enhance throughput and reduce costs. It has secured $22M in funding and completed a third-party audit, positioning itself as a credible infrastructure upgrade for the Solana ecosystem.
